title: VAERS
cleaned_text: If you fill in the form by hand, provide age in years. If a child is less than 1 year old, provide months of age. If a child is more than 1 year old but less than 2 years old, provide year and months (e.g., 1 year and 6 months). If a child is less than 1 month of age when vaccinated (e.g., a birth dose of hepatitis B vaccine) then answer 0 years and 0 months, but be sure to include the patient's date of birth ( Item 2) and date and time of vaccination ( Item 4). En Español: Si completa el formulario meses). Si un niño ej., la vacunación del paciente ( Ítem 4).
